column2: Date: 2/14/18, 2:30-3:20 pm Class: Lecture C Instructor: Suzanne Brahmia No. Students: 117 Arranged how? Lecture

Notes: Auditorium stadium seating, large projector and chalk boards. Demo tables at front of room. Starts lecture with group "activity" about vectors. Next is quiz question- appears to be learning catalytics or something similar- students have phones and computers out. They can work together but must give their own answer.  Lecture is on powerpoint slides- topic is vectors with examples in forces/projectile motion.

column27: Instructor does not wander during CQ, waits at front
Half the CQ are exercises and half are labeled "quiz"
